title: Les Yeux Fermes = the Eyes Closed
description: Ivan returns from touring with a theatre company. During the tour one of Ivan's friend died. Back in Paris, Ivan experiences vision toubles and buys a pair of black glasses. From then on, he starts pretending to be a blind man. His girlfriend Xenie witnesses helplessly the slow march towards madness of a 'blind' man whose only markers are noises and memories..  Credits: Director, Joel Santoni ; writer, Jeanne Bronner, Joel Santoni, Claude Breuer ; photography, Pierre-William Glenn ; music, Terry Riley. Cast: Gerard Desarthe, Lorraine Rainer, Jean Carmet, Marcel Dalio, Lucien Raimbourg.
